Section.name: About KSRMCE
Section.description:
Kandula Sreenivasa Reddy Memorial College Of Engineering(KSRMCE) was established in 1980. It was established to perpetuate the memory of Late Sri. Srinivasa Reddy, youngest son of Late Sri Obul Reddy. The College is affiliated to JNTU Anantpur.
KSRMCE AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
